informations.title: Innovation for the Future
informations.p:
The future of innovation is directly linked to the ability to adapt and transform ideas into practical solutions. At the UFGD Innovation Hub, we promote interdisciplinarity and technological development focused on solutions that integrate applied research and scientific advancement. We believe that through collaboration and knowledge exchange, it is possible to create technologies capable of transforming realities and promoting sustainable growth.
We are committed to creating an innovative environment, where students, professors, and partners can develop projects that positively impact society.

informations.title: Why become a partner of the Hub?
informations.p:
Becoming a partner of the UFGD Innovation Hub means being at the forefront of technological innovation. Companies, institutions, and professionals who join us have the opportunity to participate in projects that integrate cutting-edge technologies, promoting sustainable development and scientific advancement.
Our partners have direct access to applied research, the development of innovative solutions, and the training of qualified talents, contributing to the modernization of industrial processes and social transformation.

informations.title: We are 100% prepared
informations.p:
The UFGD Innovation Hub is fully prepared to face the challenges of the current technological market. Our organizational structure was developed to ensure efficiency, interdisciplinary collaboration, and transparent resource management.
With specialized centers and a highly qualified team, we provide an environment where innovation and applied research converge to generate practical and high-impact solutions. We are ready to turn ideas into reality and lead UFGD to a leading position in the national and international innovation scene.
